properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 29 at 3:35AM PST until February 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* CHANGES...No changes.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. High profile vehicle restrictions and rough air for
flying are likely.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to recent dry weather, rapid fire
spread is possible in the hills around the region. Exercise
care if out on public lands and follow any burn restrictions
in place by local fire services.
properties.instruction:
Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio
furniture and trash cans before winds increase which could blow
these items away. Check road and traffic conditions before
heading out.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING
